description: Led front-end design and development of the new Mastercard Academy on the Web platform, focusing on UI/UX enhancements and optimization.
Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues related to the payment process, including failed transactions and account settings.
Utilize web development and coding expertise to enhance the advertiser experience and improve advertising returns.
Designed and created visual materials such as newsletters, posters, postcards, logos, web posts, and social media resources for various clients and projects.
